name: Tiffany's Disgusting Adventure
description:
Tiffany slipped and fell into a sewer. You must help her find her way back to the surface, but many dangers lurk below. Don't let her coat be tarnished with the disgusting beasties and toxic sludge.

Controls:

  • AD/Arrow-left/right to move
  • W/Spacebar/up-arrow to jump
  • left control/left mouse click to scratch.
  • left shift to sprint
  • H to meow
  • M to toggle music
  • Escape to pause/quit
